description: There's been an urgent security bulletin sent out in a few places today in the Linux sphere that relates to the XZ tools and libraries with liblzma, as certain version have been compromised.
title: XZ tools and libraries compromised with a critical issue

description: Valve has released a new Proton Experimental update that pulls in some nice fixes for Linux Desktop and Steam Deck gamers, and this update should improve quite a few games!
title: Proton Experimental updated for The Finals, Red Alert 2, deals with high core count CPUs

description: From Transhuman Design we have the next survivor-like game with Maniac, that puts it into a classic GTA setting while you go on a bit of a frenzy.
title: Maniac is classic GTA meets Vampire Survivors - out now on Steam

description: The fantastic monster collection game Cassette Beasts is adding in online multiplayer, with a Beta available now with the full update due out on May 20th.
title: Multiplayer comes to Cassette Beasts on May 20th
